title: Critical Theory Can't Deliver because it can't make Voltron from its crippled Christian Code
description:
Now new and "improved" without the Voltron segment due to copywrite blocking the video. 

With the killing of George Floyd corporations far and wide are falling over themselves to send out the proper liturgical moral signalling. While much of this is well intended it won't yield the utopia people are looking for.
